short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Riddle School Unblocked game on Classroom 6x. Riddle School online game. For Riddle School fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Riddle School is an engaging puzzle and mystery game, marking the debut of the Riddle School series. Trapped in a dull classroom, you're determined to escape school. To succeed, you'll need to manipulate objects in the classrooms and hallways, outwit teachers, and find a way out of your tedious class. The game features a straightforward point-and-click interface, enjoyable gameplay, and thought-provoking puzzles.

If you have any questions about our Riddle School Unblocked game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Riddle School Unblocked game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
